description: Circular form with raised center column.  Radial carved lines and small perforations around center.  Surface cracking from drying.  Hand-formed.

Clay fragment with gold surface coating.  Irregular triangle shape.  Incised crosshatch lines and small puncture marks across surface.  Edges uneven; minor chipping present.  Hand-formed and decorated.

Clay cylinder with hollow center.  Brown surface coating; white interior visible at the rim.  Uneven walls and base; vertical tool marks present.  Surface crackin from drying.  Hand-formed; possible container.

Clay fragments with orange surface coating.  Irregular broken pieces; interior clay exposed.  One fragment shows small perforations and carved markings.  Edges fractured post-formation.  Hand-formed and decorated.  Likely part of a larger object.
Clay fragment, white surface.  Irregular triangle shape.  Small puncture designs arranged in patterns.  Edges broken.  Hand-formed and decorated.  Likely fragment of a larger decorative object.

Clay composite form with multiple color coatings.  Cylindrical upper section attached to rounded base.  Surface uneven with visible hand shaping and cracking.  Painted details suggest layered design.  Hand-formed.

Clay fragment, light gray surface.  Irregular wedge shape with carved linear markings on one face.  Edges uneven; minor cracking present.  Hand formed and incised.  Likely part of a larger decorative piece.

Clay fragment, light brown surface.  Irregular rounded shape with carved linear grooves on one face.  Surface cracking present from drying.  Hand-formed, minimal decoration.  Possibly fragment of larger piece.
Stone fragment, gray surface.  Irregular elongated shape with raised central edge. Edges uneven; minor surface cracking.  Hand-formed. Possible arrowhead.

Ceramic vessel form with hollow center and flared rim.  Rounded body with attached base.  Surface uneven with visible hand shaping and cracking.  Light surface coating present.  Hand-formed; container-like structure.
Clay fragment with blue surface coating.  Irregular shape with flattened base on one end.  Surface shows smoothing marks and minor chipping.  Hand-formed; possibly fragment of larger structure.

Clay object with blue surface coating.  Elongated form with rounded, shallow bowl at one end and narrow handle.  Surface smoothing marks visible; minor cracking and residue present.  Hand-formed; utensil-like shape.
